name: Threatening Situations 4Ds
description: A referenced standard for managing threatening situations that Customer Greeters must read, understand and comply with, and adhere to via the Managing Threatening Situations - 4Ds Poster when reporting suspicious behaviour.
keywords: Managing Threatening Situations - Kmart Way module
constraints: Customer Greeter has read, understood and complies with the Threatening Situations 4Ds.
caveats: If any of the above Customer Service Standards creates a threatening situation or aggressive behaviour from the customer, always adhere to the 5Ds and threatening situations.
Report the incident to a manager discreetly.
bestPractice: Report suspicious behaviour discreetly using P2T whilst adhering to the Managing Threatening Situations - 4Ds Poster.
All threatening situations must be reported via the Safety Solvsafety portal.
